website_summaries.verdict: Those looking for a high-quality teddy from a reliable brand will enjoy this oversized creation from Vermont Teddy Bears.
pros: Available for purchase in various sizes
Customers appreciate the extremely soft material, making it the perfect snuggle buddy
cons: A few customers complained that the bear arrived with damage from shipping

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, at least my wife is. I'm a little jealous.
customer_reviews.author: Furman J Rogers

customer_reviews.title: It is soft and fuzzy and such a darling face ...
customer_reviews.text: It is soft and fuzzy and such a darling face. Just what I needed. I'm 71 years old, had a stroke last year and lost my little dog at Christmas. I needed something to lift my spirits and the Teddy Bear did it! Thank you Vermont Teddy Bear for making such a loving bear!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goldy Locks & her bear buddy
customer_reviews.text: I bought Vermont Teddy Bear 4 ft for my 6 yr god daughters birthday,she loved it so much she feel asleep on it ! She says it's soooo soft and huggable !! And I was worried I wouldn't get it in time but it showed up on time on the delivery date.A day before her birthday ! VERY HAPPY !!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Deihl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Vermont teddy Bear for comfort and love.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cuddly, super soft BIG (but not too big) Vermont Teddy Bear that's fun; it's a feel-good stuffed animal perfect for hugging, resting on, and bringing smiles and comfort. It's not the fancy, articulated version for collectors. I looked at generic versions, but just couldn't do it. Maybe being a former Vermonter and now living in another NE state famous for quality goods has ingrained the idea of buying well-made items worth the (sometimes) extra. In actuality other, generic BIG bears were available and cost a heck of a lot more. The price is very reasonable for product !
customer_reviews.author: SacoFamily2

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE AND COMFORTING
customer_reviews.text: I feel zero shame in loving the hell out of this bear. I'm a tad anxiously attached and it's just nice to lay around with my bear when my man isn't around. I bought the 4 foot bear and for the record the bear fits an XL/2XL shirt, lol. I end up using him like a pillow to lean up against while watching tv. His body proportions are great and as far as I can tell he is built to last **4 month update: My bear friend is going strong. He holds up to lots of loves and hugs, I haven't noticed any lost fur or holes and I would still recommend strongly. So fluffy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love him!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby bought him for me for Valentine's day! His name is Charley Bear! Love him!
customer_reviews.author: myra65

customer_reviews.title: The fur and threads are not stiched well. The size mentioned is correct.
customer_reviews.text: Just received my teddy bear. The teddy is the perfect size and right size as mentioned in the description. I am happy with the size but the stuffing feels less, as the teddy isnt able to sit without support and some places like hands and legs are havr empty places. Also the fur is coming out. I am going to keep it for a day or two n watch, of it holds its form and stop shedding the fur. If it doesnt I'll return. So its cuddly n soft but not a good quality like I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Pardeep

customer_reviews.title: The fluffiest!
customer_reviews.text: The best gift ever! He's so fluffy and sweet 😍 He's huge even for a 5'11" like myself. The brand company seem so nice, even though I didn't have to use them yet, but their "hospital" sounds fabulous. I'm so happy I got him!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly soft and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect Valentines Day gift for my woman. I am out of the country for a contract and she adores it. Perfect quality and great size (3.5 ft). She never liked teddy bears until this one arrived in perfect shape. It is also so large that her cat and dog leave it alone, they don't dare attack it like every other small stuffed critter she has.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Arn

customer_reviews.title: Meet Gus
customer_reviews.text: This very handsome bear is a great snuggle partner and seems to enjoy his new digs! He is very soft and huggable...well worth the purchase price. The Vermont Teddy Bear company has the advantage of being a USA company which give me confidence that the bear does not have any possibly unhealthy components. Gus is dressed up with a hat and tie also available form Amazon and it seems to suit him.
customer_reviews.author: SenecaSailor

customer_reviews.title: Worth the comfort of a snuggle when you are lonely
customer_reviews.text: I bought this instead of a body pillow and oh how it has helped my sleep. I work long night shifts in the healthcare field and when I get home I have difficulty relaxing for sleep - first night(well it was day) I snuggled up and almost immediately was asleep - I often also use soothing scents and it’s great. I put an extra large shirt on it to protect it from body oils as much as possible too. Very much worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: RDJ

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: He’s very cozy and cuddly -please note that I’m 5’6” and 180 lbs. I always drag with me to bed or couch. I can easily lay on him comfortably. The only downside is that if you grabbed him with his fur.. it’s gonna come out very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Noora

customer_reviews.title: A Jack Russell’s best friend!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE their Teddy Bears! We have a Jack Terrier that needs to play every night before bed. When the weather is too bad for her to play outside which is a lot where we live she plays “attack” the teddy for 20-30 min a night. She has even fallen asleep while playing with her teddy. It’s so big and sturdy that nothing happens to teddy during these play sessions. If she doesn’t get to play with teddy on the days she can’t go outside she is not a happy dog. A great dog lady once told me a tired dog is a happy dog. We also bought a smaller “travel” size teddy for when we are on the road.
customer_reviews.author: WRPS

customer_reviews.title: Big soft lovable bear!
customer_reviews.text: Came all squished up in a box and was a little worried but it puffed right up. Gift for my granddaughter a year ago Christmas. She weighs 70 pounds and her dog weighs 80 pounds, they both lay on that big old bear almost every night while relaxing before bed. There is a little hole that started in the seam under it's chin that was very easy to sew right up. Considering the amount of loving that this thing gets I'm surprised it's still in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jill S.

customer_reviews.title: Second to none. Vermont Teddy Bears delivered.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this big ol' bear to anybody. Purchased this as a Valentine's Day present, and she was ecstatic, to say the least! It's absolutely ginormous, and any child or female in your life will be thrilled to receive this as a gift. Outstanding quality and build. Second to none.
customer_reviews.author: GRaFTON DeRKa-DeRKa

customer_reviews.title: Tearing me up.
customer_reviews.text: This bear is so huge it's like cuddling with a small person. Put it on the couch next to you and never be lonely. Very soft and very fluffy. My only complaint is there was a tear on the back. It looks to be maybe where they stuff it. I expected perfection from the notorious Vermont Teddy Bear Co. That's why I gave it a 4/5.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Ray.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Valentines Day Gift. Upon arrival the Bear’s head had a hole on the left side of its neck about 2 inches wide. I sewed it only to discover another hole on the right side of its neck...the thing arrived decapitated pretty much.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Snuggable. Huggable. Happy making. Great Size. Wonderful Gift.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these over the years for my adult friends in various mental stages. I have one for myself, too. You can squish, hug, embrace, talk to, toss, dress in hats. Bella Bear is gender fluid. Sometimes she's Bella; sometimes Bear. A true boon during these social distance days. How can one look at that bear face and not smile.
customer_reviews.author: CF FL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a really old teddy bear she got from her grandmother nearly 25 years ago, and you can tell the poor thing was very loved throughout my wife’s childhood. She had mentioned how soft it used to be. Well I got this as a replacement bear since it’s the same company that made the bear her grandmother gave her, and she’s totally in love with it! I got the 3 foot bear, and it’s actually a lot bigger than her original bear (oops) but my wife loves it none the less. I decided to also get her a 6 foot one as a surprise!
customer_reviews.author: S.F.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bear!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful "stuffed animal" I've ever seen. It is soft, well-made, and the company is wonderful. I bought a 4ft and a 6ft bear, and both were shipped quickly, arrived in perfect condition, and have held up with kids laying on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Really fluffy
customer_reviews.text: very fluffy and soft. came in a very sturdy box and the big guy was folded in half but he sprang out of box to his big fluffy self! At first I thought the $95 was a lot of $ for a bear but the quality of it was worth it. He will be around for along time!
customer_reviews.author: MeMe

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my nephew’s 2nd birthday. He effin’ LOVES this thing. My sister says every morning he wakes up and first thing he want to do is play with Teddy. He abuses the daylights from thing. Wrestles with it, body slams it, drags it from room to room (takes all of his strength). It’s held up really well. I was a little nervous, as the instructions say to not pull on the limbs or ears because they may rip, but nobody told him that and Teddy is doing just fine. 10/10!! Best gift for a 2 year old you can find.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: American-Made Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought an American-made teddy bear because I wanted great quality and no weird smells! Vermont Teddy Bear did not disappoint! Our son loves this bear and we know he will get years out of it. The cute care instructions are a plus. I have friends who have bought giant teddy bears made in China and when they ripped, they found recycled stuffed animals inside as part of the stuffing!! I am so glad we bought from this company.
customer_reviews.author: AVG

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Except she's got some hard furs
customer_reviews.text: She is wonderful! So soft that I can lay on her all day long! The only reason I give 4 stars is because few of her furs fall on the floor, and some have hard ends attached to the main body, which make me want to pull them away from her... but the hard furs mostly are on the edge of her feet and I can find less than 10 throughout her soft body.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Young

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but good quality and no off gassing.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, soft and odor free...no off gassing like some stuffed products. And he is BIG. Kids love him.
customer_reviews.author: Weema

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cute and addictive teddy.
customer_reviews.text: The product is overall good. It is soft and very comfortable for cuddling. But the order I received had a big hole on the right side of the neck. Disappointed. Update: I got a replacement from the seller and the new teddy is great! I love it. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Parveen Sultana

customer_reviews.title: This bear looks good only in laying down position.
customer_reviews.text: Cons: 1. Big legs and spread apart 2. Head is limp, no support. 3. The quality is questionable. Pros: 1. Keeps us company.
customer_reviews.author: Tievoli

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and a bit creepy
customer_reviews.text: Super soft bear that my kids love. Beware, though, his long legs make him a bit creepy. One moment he’s sitting pleasantly on the couch, the next he’s slouched over with his head buried between his legs, or on his back with his legs dangling every which way. Other bears don’t do this.
customer_reviews.author: JJB

customer_reviews.title: “Best bear ever”-I’m 70 years old!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Boo...my husband is a hunter so I have many nights alone, and now I’m not❣️ Absolutely perfect (lifetime guaranteed, machine-washable) and made for pet lovers who rent NO PETS ALLOWED homes.
customer_reviews.author: jonni

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Snuggly
customer_reviews.text: This bear was purchased as a gift for my daughter. She loved it and immediately snuggled up with it, exclaiming it was the best present ever. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Atwell

customer_reviews.title: Great Bear For All Ages
customer_reviews.text: With the lose of my girls Dad, I wanted to give them something BIG and HUGGABLE to have . My girls are 15 and 13 . Acted like little kids when they pulled them out of the box. I'm SO HAPPY with my decision to get the bears from you all. Everything is great about them. No Complaints. Thank You Vermont Teddy Bear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great surprise gift
customer_reviews.text: Husband got me this for Valentines Day. Great gift surprise. So soft. Sits at the table or on the bed. Anywhere it sits looks cute. Lifetime warranty is a plus. Well made. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: weezie8101076

customer_reviews.title: We are super pleased with this purchase and couldn't have been happier ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought my son this giant teddy bear for his 8th birthday, and he absolutely loves it! It is comfy, warm, and everything a giant stuffed bear should be! We are super pleased with this purchase and couldn't have been happier about the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice and fluffy teddy bear. But it’s neck is very floppy and always falls down. I should have returned it at first place but my daughter loved the feel. I would not recommend buying this product since there are many similar good products in market.
customer_reviews.author: Kedar Sharbidre

customer_reviews.title: Good proportions
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these giant teddy bears before, and each time it’s been one from China that’s far bigger height wise but has absurdly long legs and looks horrible. Finally decided to spend a little more on a bear that was a bit smaller from a proper brand, and it’s definitely worth it. The bear looks and feels good, with properly sized legs.
customer_reviews.author: justin r.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the empty side of the bed
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my mom to use like a body pillow. After we lost my dad last year, she’s had a difficult time sleeping in an empty bed. The size and weight of this bear fits perfectly on the empty side of the bed. He’s soft, cuddly and helps my mom feel not quite so alone at night.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Grier

customer_reviews.title: perfectly safe and made in the USA!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I bought these for my two fur babies( pup)s who love to sleep with giant bears ... they love them, they don't tear them up like they do their smaller toys... I think the size helps them feel comforted like a bed! I am very happy with the Teddy bear and so are my Furbabies! NOt so worried about the material as I am most dog toys.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Ridgeway

customer_reviews.title: Great for BFF
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my best friend as a surprise, she had no idea at all it was coming nor that it was from me! And she absolutely loves it 😊
customer_reviews.author: chuckles

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and super big
customer_reviews.text: This bear is incredible. Not only is it huge, but it’s so soft and cuddly. My son loves it. And the box was so fun to open!
customer_reviews.author: A. Lieby

customer_reviews.title: ... decide if I should send him back he is Perfect other than a lack of stuffing in his stomach ...
customer_reviews.text: I can’t decide if I should send him back he is Perfect other than a lack of stuffing in his stomach area that creates a hole I’ve fluffed and fluffed him out but it won’t go away it really isn’t that bad but I wish she or he was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tom Watkins

customer_reviews.title: New snuggle buddy!
customer_reviews.text: I did not want a cheap looking stuffed bear, and this one was PERFECT! He's good-looking and plump. My 16 year old daughter loves him. The bear looks attractive and decorative on her white comforter and is her new nighttime snuggle buddy. Only drawback is he's too big to take when she spends the night with a friend, haha.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda J.

customer_reviews.title: we are so glad we made the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Our two grand children 18 months and 3 were speechless when the bear arrived. they play with it, lay on it sleep on it and drag it around the house it is soft, very well made, safe for children of all ages, we are so glad we made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: james b king

customer_reviews.title: Big bear is adorable, but not as high
customer_reviews.text: Big bear is adorable, but not as high, quality, as expected. There was a defect on the back/neck seam of the bear & the store emailed me quickly to offer a replacement, so I was very happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Melodie Chisteckoff

customer_reviews.title: The best part is you don't have to feed or walk it
customer_reviews.text: What more can a single guy/gal ask for. It's like having a best friend for all your secrets and doesn't need a lot of care. No food or walks or clean up after. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: A Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Huge bear!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bear for 1 year old birthdays!! Very large and cuddley.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Gift for wife
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to sit in the rocker in my wife's office at her work. Looks cute and fitted into rocker nicely
customer_reviews.author: Al R.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a perfect teddy bear
customer_reviews.text: real feel of an friendly animal big enough soft enough for an amazing hug pet warm.teddy will be with our family for many decades
customer_reviews.author: realdeal57

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious/soft
customer_reviews.text: Luxurious, soft. No chemical smell. Looks/feels expensive. Great to cuddle with
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love this bear which we purchased for our 7 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this bear which we purchased for our 7 year old granddaughter for Christmas. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because there was not as much stuffing in the belly as I expected, or maybe it has migrated to the legs. She sleeps on it and sits on it for school and to watch TV and the belly is not as full as it was when we first got it. Otherwise very durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great bear
customer_reviews.text: Love this bear. Vermont bears always come through with a quality product. Couldn’t be happier about it as it was a gift for friends with a new baby.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Survived a wresting match with the 7yr old
customer_reviews.text: He is soft, his fur was super soft, and my nephew helped fluff him up the day of arrival by repeatedly using him as a landing pad and wrestling partner. Such a huggable, tackleable bear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the Tim Treadwell in all of us
customer_reviews.text: The bear is big. The bear is soft. The price was right. The bear is named Gus now thanks to our cute grandkid. The grandkid is happy. We are happy. All is well.
customer_reviews.author: ThunderBumper

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughters loved ths Valentine Day gift
customer_reviews.text: My two grand daughters, 10 and almost 2, were completely delighted by this 4 foot bear. The almost 2 year old had been fussy with her recent teething, but her joy over this surprise has made my daughter smile too. Now I'm enjoying being "The best Poppy ever." Grand parents take notice and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: 5kman

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Huge, fluffy, lots of stuffing in this great bear! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: DEM

customer_reviews.title: Best bear ever
customer_reviews.text: The bear arrived clean, soft, and well stuffed. I’ve had bears that come half stuffed or have a chemical odor but neither were problems with this company. The bear made a very nice gift and made someone really happy.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son who has Fragile X loves laying with the bear!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love! Fits in front loader. Daughter uses as a pillow. Durable and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Ahne

customer_reviews.title: Great bear!!
customer_reviews.text: Love him!!! Just the right size. Super soft and cuddly. Needed a little more stuffing in his head but otherwise fantastic
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Look no more this is an awesome teddy bear
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a nice product !!! I couldn’t believe how happy this bear made someone. Ultimate in teddy bears !!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bear and so does my daughter (and dog) ! I love that this product has a lifetime guarantee, my dog ripped a hole in my daughter's bear and I contacted the seller and they are sending a replacement! Soo grateful! Thank you, excellent customer service with same or next day response rate.
customer_reviews.author: Nyre Treblot

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well as a gift, Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hare

customer_reviews.title: Great Bear
customer_reviews.text: Really a great bear, gave to my girlfriend but she dumped me a couple of weeks later and kept the bear
customer_reviews.author: Jbutler53

customer_reviews.title: Super Gift
customer_reviews.text: She loves it. Unfortunately, it occurs the only chair in the bedroom and scares me occasionally when I think someone is there.
customer_reviews.author: Noblenorm

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT TEDDY BEAR!!
customer_reviews.text: So cute, soft and cuddly I sleep with it on my bed every night! Even my cats love Teddy! They sleep in between his legs at night. Very Very Satisfied with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Nice and big and very soft and made of very nice material. Every child needs one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE: the box says teddy bear on the outside. If you’re trying to surprise someone send it somewhere else. Other than that, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Pons

customer_reviews.title: Big Bear
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I expected, but pretty cool. Will make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Duane O. Abbott

customer_reviews.title: A bear to love !
customer_reviews.text: I loved the packaging, simple and fun, and my grandson drags it all over the place. He named him Hank and we put a red bandana on Hank. Now, the three siblings gotta have one too ! Nana is a RockStar ! Thank you Vermont Bears for RockStar Status. Hank is sturdy, plush and obviously loved !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Teddy Bear
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter on her 10th bday. It’s her FAVORITE gift. It’s extremely soft and plush. Her friends love it as well and some have fallen asleep cuddling it when they are sleeping over. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Monica C.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mother’s 70th birthday!!! She ❤️❤️❤️ it !!! It’s so cozy and huge!!!! I would definitely recommend this item!!
customer_reviews.author: Bubble

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great packaging!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Vermont Teddy Bear -Big Love and it was just before Christmas. The bear arrived on Christmas Eve and it was perfect! The packaging was very well done and the bear is incredibly soft and wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: He is a great pillow to lay on when she has a movie ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the three foot brown Vermony Teddy Bear for my four and a half year old granddaughter. She wanted a teddy bear as big as she is. She loves her bear and tucks him in her bed at night. He is a great pillow to lay on when she has a movie night at home. Great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Jerianne Lackey

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: It is the gift for my girl friend. She pretty like it
customer_reviews.author: Teddywang1992

customer_reviews.title: Nice size bear
customer_reviews.text: Nice size bear, but I only had it 2 weeks and there was a rip on the leg. The hair also sheds. Cost way to much for that to happen so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Carinthia Miller

customer_reviews.title: A friend for life!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! He is huge and soft and well made and what's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: 1Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson during the pandemic. He loves it. Soft and cuddly and comforting.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Nashawaty

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Huggable Bear
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son's first birthday and he loves it! The Made In USA tag also makes you feel proud of buying something valuable!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Hospital Companion  Raises Spirits
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect gift for our friend in the hospital. She could not have flowers due to her condition. Excellent quality! don't be fooled by cheap knockoffs.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: I love my hunka bear !!!!! PERFECT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my hunka bear ! Perfect for my baby shower theme which is teddy bears ! He will be the center of attention lol ! He’s so big n soft . So worth it !
customer_reviews.author: Loveely.a

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this bear! I bought it for my friend fir valentines, and I'm sure she's going to love. I was worried about the stuffing being smashed in the packaging making the pair lumpy or flat, but luckily this was not the case. It came in a box just as big as the bear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Just as I expected: larga, soft, cuddly, and my granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: lynne williams

customer_reviews.title: Not as described, not worth the money. Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: This bear is not as described. It’s small ! Like very small and not worth the money at all. It looks absolutely positively NOTHING like the picture. I’m so mad I wasted my money on this bs. DO NOT BUY ITS A HUGE SCAM
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Big, soft and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Great big soft cuddly bear! Very well made as all Vermont Teddy Bears are
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR
customer_reviews.text: I like this Teddy Bear, there is some good build quality I would give it 5 stars but there is one thing that this bear lacks and it is the stuffing maybe it could just be MY bear but mine seems a little under stuffed and it is saggy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He was perfect. So soft & cuddly
customer_reviews.text: He was perfect. So soft & cuddly, I wanted to keep him. Prompt arrival (time was a factor) & excellent packaging. Totally encased in protective plastic inside the box.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Betz

customer_reviews.title: On my Wish List!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Purchased for our grandson, now I want one for myself!...
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Marta

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for my 2 year old great nephew's birthday since he loved mine sooooo much
customer_reviews.text: I already have one of these. I bought it for my 2 year old great nephew's birthday since he loved mine sooooo much. He likes to run and jump on the bear. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Cjk

customer_reviews.title: why bother
customer_reviews.text: Don't get it for her. She will cheat on you. Just save your money. The stitching was great and it was soft.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: cozy and soft
customer_reviews.text: Me and my 3 years old daughter loved it!! Cozy and soft 🥰😍
customer_reviews.author: Malka

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STUFFED BEAR

customer_reviews.title: It's huge!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! My wife was said she missed when I would buy her a teddy bear as a gift when we were younger. So I got her the biggest one I could find! The look on her face was priceless!! She loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute bear but it’s extremly soft, it doesn’t have near enough stuffing. I’m still contemplating if to return it and try find a better one
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Abeli

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Bear from Vermont Teddy Bear
customer_reviews.text: The bear fur seemed matted not real fluffy and he seemed to not quite have enough stuffing. After giving it to my grandson who loved it, we noticed the back was not stitched shut. Very disappointed in the quality of the Vermont Teddy Bear. Due to lack of support from either Vermont Teddy Bear or Amazon we are having it stitched and walking away. I am having more and more problems with items I order from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT L   SNYDER

customer_reviews.title: Quality and worth the money.

product_meta.title: Vermont Teddy Bear Giant Teddy Bear - Big Teddy Bear, 4 Foot
feature_bullets: SOFT FUR MAKES THE BEST BEAR HUGS - Because we make our big fluffy Teddy Bears with the highest-quality fur, there's no shedding or clumps; 4-foot brown huge Teddy Bear is soft, smooth and oh-so squeezable, and the large size is perfect for cuddling

HIGH-QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - A Bear stuffed animal you can feel good about; Our 4 ft Teddy Bear is stuffed and back-stitched with love in Vermont, USA, using 100% recycled stuffing and soft fur, making it the perfect gift or children's toy

LIFETIME GUARANTEE - The second your large Bear comes out of the box, it's guaranteed for life, meaning any damage can be mended at the bear hospital in Vermont; If it can't, a new Bear will be sent along with condolences-and a new lifetime guarantee

A BEST FRIEND WITH PERSONALITY - Gigantic soft brown Teddy Bear has an adorable expression, a unique mix of curiosity, mischief and fun that brings a lifetime of joy; Huge, fun Teddy Bear is a thoughtful gift for the wife, daughter or girlfriend

OUR CUSTOMERS LOVE A BIG SQUEEZE – "It's so soft and works well as a backrest pillow!" "Cute, soft and cuddly; I sleep with it every night!" "Super soft and a perfect size to cuddle up to!" "My daughter loves it-very pleased with my purchase
